channel.title: Prometheus 718 || 24/7 || Weekly Updates || Loads Of Content #new
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://prometheus-rsps.net/images/Prometheus.png[/img] Edit: Please make sure you register on the forums before playing! The forums accounts are integrated with the server.
[SIZE=5]Website: [URL=http://prometheus-rsps.net/]Click here[/URL] Forums: [URL=http://prometheus-rsps.net/forum]Click here[/URL] Play Now: [URL=http://prometheus-rsps.net/index.php?id=5]Click here[/URL][/SIZE]
[ul][*]- All Skills working. [*]- Double Exp Week ends. [*]- Difficulty system. [*]- View stats. [*]- Prestige. [*]- Achievements. [*]- Custom Titles. [*]- Loyalty Rewards [*]- Squeal of Fortune. [*]- Skilling rewards. [*]- Contract system. (kill a targeted boss for a reward) [*]- Forums Integration. [*]- A Legal Vbulleting Forums. [*]- Vote4rewards. [*]- Auto Donate. [*]- Highscores. [*]- Daily-Weekly Updates.[/ul]
[URL=http://prometheus-rsps.net/][img]http://prometheus-rsps.net/images/PrometheusAdv.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Prometheus 718 || 24/7 || Weekly Updates || Loads Of Content #new
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

98% the same as any other 718.
Cant deny that sofar, you are right at the moment.

You claim to have a Wiki, though the command opens my downloads folder…:
We are setting a Wiki up on monday allong with the release of two new bosses.

Most Skills can’t be trained, i tried to train Thieving didn’t even work.
All skills work except for construction which is in development now.
Construction came as a boring item on item skill in the source. So we are adding a way to make POH.
About Thieving, it does work. The first time pickpocketing a man just takes a few tries before it was a succesfull robbery. Might make it so the lvl thieving will be 50% chance so people don`t stay to long on the first pickpocket.

Overall the server is boring as hell, i might come back when the beta is over this server right now is a waste of time for me.
Thanks for checking it and your time anyways. Critism is always welcome.

Edit: I have some bad news for now. Our website and server is offline for the moment as yesterday our home dedicated server burned through. For all players who joined and are asking if their accounts are lost I would like to answer that straight away. The dedicated servers power supply burned through when the owner of the dedi was not home. When he came home the house smelled like burned electronica. Luckily the hardware is designed to turn of if it detects overheating so no damage was done to the house (for example burning the house down). All data is still intact. We are currently setting up our other deidcated server which takes a little while because it was standing in the garage. So we cant turn it on straight away because the weather in holland is known to be wet. After we set the dedicated server up we will transfer all the webfiles and server files to the new dedicated server. Im sorry that its offline for now.

Some updates where done though hehe:
New custom boss with its own custom script, the boss is called Lavora.
The boss has a few ability`s for now which are:
Normal hit (range), shoots a cannonball with his handcannon.
Freeze, he will freeze you for 20 seconds and a snowball will be fired at you from the handcannon. While this happens your characted plays a GFX of snow.
If the boss is under 5k hp he will heal him self (chance 1/5) 500 hp taking away 250 hp from each player which is in combat with it.

New highscores: We decided to install King Fox Highscores. We made it so there are 5 tables, for each exp rate there is a highscore. This way the extreme and hard exp rate are fun to choose as you can compete with others for the number one spot on the highscores.

Read full topic

Overall the server is boring as hell, i might come back when the beta is over this server right now is a waste of time for me.
